title: Emerald and Tanzanite Dewdrop Jhumkas - Pancha Ratna Mohana
features: A modern interpretation of the classic Jhumka, featuring a cascading design. A delicate Emerald nestles above a pair of Blue Carved Tanzanites, with Rose Cut diamonds accenting the gold scrollwork. Below, Pink Beads add a touch of whimsy. Designed with a secure lever-back clasp for comfortable wear.
occasions: or to elevate everyday style. Equally suitable for a modern bride looking for a unique touch of color or a festive get-together.
description: These earrings are a unique blend of classic design and modern sensibility. The vibrant Emeralds and Tanzanites, paired with the subtle sparkle of diamonds, create a captivating and sophisticated look. The handcrafted details showcase exquisite craftsmanship and ensure that each pair is a one-of-a-kind treasure. The secure setting and comfortable fit make these earrings ideal for all-day wear.
